sourcesContent: import*as t from"react";import{getConsecutiveIntArray as r}from"../shared/utils.mjs";const a="...",m=(a,m,e=1)=>t.useMemo((()=>{const t=Math.max(a,1),o=Math.max(e,1),n=Math.max(t,m),s=n;if(n<5+2*o)return r(1,n);const i=Math.max(t-o,1),h=Math.min(t+o,s),u=i>2,M=h<s-1;if(u&&!M){return[1,"...",...r(s-(3+2*o)+1,s)]}if(!u&&M){return[...r(1,3+2*o),"...",s]}return[1,"...",...r(i,h),"...",s]}),[a,m,e]);export{a as ELLIPSIS,m as useRange};
